casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Dreyer, Appellant, v. Anderson Township et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Dreyer v. Anderson Twp., 107 Ohio St.3d 295, 2005-Ohio-6511.]

(No. 2005-0503 Submitted October 25, 2005 Decided December 28, 2005.) The Law Office of James A. Whittaker, L.L.C., and James A. Whittaker, for appellant. Jim Petro, Attorney General, and Andrew J. Alatis, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission of Ohio.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Motee, C.J., Resnick, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., concur.
